scripts.build: mkdir -p build-editor build-frontend build && wp-scripts build src/editor.js --output-path=build-editor && wp-scripts build src/frontend.js --output-path=build-frontend && cp build-editor/* build/ && cp build-frontend/* build/ && rm -rf build-editor build-frontend
scripts.start: wp-scripts start src/editor.js --output-path=build & wp-scripts start src/frontend.js --output-path=build
